title: Olympic Road Race Favorites? Not Us, Say Belgian Stars Evenepoel and Van Aert
content:
The four-rider Belgian squad looks to have the watts and power to out-muscle all comers, including five-star favorite Mathieu van der Poel.

Read the full article at Olympic Road Race Favorites? Not Us, Say Belgian Stars Evenepoel and Van Aert on Velo.
author: ahood
